attributes.action: Prevent health authorities from requiring water companies to fluoridate our water
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Strategic Health Authorities (SHAs) have the power to compel water companies to add fluoride to our tap water.

Fluoride has been shown to help reduce tooth decay in small amounts, but:
* the proven reduction is small
* this is forced medication of the general public
* the long term health effects are not known

I believe this power should be removed from the SHAs, tooth decay is prevented by proper dental care not mass-medication.
